reviews.title: I LIKE THE TEXTURE
reviews.text: I really love the colours! They're much nicer in person. Deep purple interior, matte black exterior. My only complaint is that the plates are a bit too big to stand up in the plate section of my countertop dishwasher, although I've found a workaround that suits. :) The paint is holding up great, the dishes are holding up great. I love the size of the bowls, and find I'm eating most things out of those. LOL The dinner plates are ginormous, and I typically end up eating off the dessert plates! They do make an impact aesthetically though, and I love them. :)

reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
reviews.text: Like others have commented, these dishes came impressively well packed. The box they arrived in wasn't pristine, but my concern about breakage was unfounded. They only 'cons' I've found to them so far are that they are quite a bit heavier than I expected (I'm telling myself that makes them very durable) and they take up quite a bit more space in my cupboards than my previous set. I can't do anything about the former, but as far as the latter, after rearranging things a bit, I was successful in getting everything to fit. They are beautiful, and I'm excited to use them, especially since I wasn't even looking for them and simple serendipitously stumbled across them.

reviews.title: NICE PRODUCTS
reviews.text: I ordered one set just to see if they were actually any good. It’s hard to tell when you order things online. But they are just as good as they look and work well in the microwave. So I’ve ordered two more sets.

reviews.title: NOT BAD
reviews.text: The dishes are decent, but I expected a bit more. The color isn't as vibrant as in the pictures, and the plates are indeed quite large. They are, however, sturdy and seem durable.

reviews.title: MIXED FEELINGS
reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about these dishes. While the design is lovely, I've noticed some chipping on the edges after a few uses. They're still functional, but I expected better durability.
